content.rendered:
Just a wee note to say that, due to various, unnecessarily-complicated technical, social, and financial reasons, this blog will be moving to a new home.

The URL will be the same, so you shouldn’t notice anything change.  If you read by RSS you may notice the feed refreshing and the DNS changes will take a while to propagate.

The new site may also have broken links, images and files – let me know if you spot anything wrong.

See you over there!

[P.S. If you can see THIS paragraph, then you’re already reading from the new location…I believe that if I was ten years younger I would, at this point, say “Woot!”]

excerpt.rendered: Due to various, unnecessarily-complicated technical, social, and financial reasons, this blog will be moving to a new home.
